page.title: 06A RURAL CONSTABLE IN APEDALE
page.content: Police work,in a rural area, means that there is no such thing as a typical day.Today,my duty started at 9am.when I phoned my local Head- quarters for orders.My first job took me to a farm where I inspected the land to see if it is suitable for a firearm to be used there.I am also required to approve applicant--is he suitable for possession of a weapon? My chat with him over a cup of tea is interupted by a radio instruction to attend a road accident. Fortunately it is a minor one, without injuries, and I am able to return to the office to complete my paper work__a daily routine and a very necessary one.
